properties.name: Area 51
properties.description: Highly classified United States Air Force facility at Groom Lake, Nevada. Frequent location of alleged UFO activity.

properties.name: Wright-Patterson AFB
properties.description: Air Force base in Ohio. Rumored storage location of alien bodies from the Roswell incident.

properties.name: RAF Woodbridge
properties.description: Former Royal Air Force station in Suffolk, UK. Site of the famous Rendlesham Forest UFO incident in 1980.

properties.name: Kapustin Yar
properties.description: Russian space launch and missile test site. Subject of numerous UFO reports during the Cold War.

properties.name: Pine Gap
properties.description: Australian-American intelligence facility near Alice Springs. Frequent subject of UFO conspiracy theories.
